tool_description: Initializes checkout session with validated cart items, calculates final pricing, applies promotions, and prepares payment processing.

billing_same_as_shipping.description: Whether billing address is same as shipping

payment_method.description: Selected payment method: credit_card, debit_card, paypal, apple_pay, google_pay

promo_codes.description: Array of promotional codes to apply

shipping_method.description: Preferred shipping method: standard, expedited, overnight

save_address.description: Whether to save address for future use

error_messages: Missing required address fields: All shipping address fields except line2 are required.
Invalid payment method: Use one of [credit_card, debit_card, paypal, apple_pay, google_pay].
Invalid shipping method: Use one of [standard, expedited, overnight].
Invalid promotional codes: One or more promo codes are invalid or expired.
Address validation failed: The provided shipping address could not be validated.
Payment method unavailable: The selected payment method is not available for this order.
usage: Provide user_id, complete shipping address, and payment_method to initialize checkout. Optionally add promo_codes, specify shipping_method, and choose whether to save address information.

checkout_session_id.description: Unique identifier for the checkout session

session_expires_at.description: Timestamp when the checkout session expires

final_total.description: Final total amount including all taxes, fees, and discounts

discount_amount.description: Total discount amount from promotional codes

payment_ready.description: Whether the session is ready for payment processing
